MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut affecting the SY4  postcode area of Wem, affecting properties in Aston St, New St and surrounding area. It was necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown for safety reasons following a fault on the underground cable. Our team will be carrying out repair work safely and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, and we expect the power to be restored by 5.30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5.09pm on 13th of January 2021.
